attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: This app is terrible, I thought I would get bts concert tickets with it. It says it comes within one second. I went outside to check my mailbox. No tickets were there. The app also makes my phone super slow. If you value your phone donâ€™t get the app.

attributes.title: Crashes your phone
attributes.review: I am trump supporter and will be voting for him but this app does not work. It crashes my phone every time I open it. I honestly think the app gave me a virus too. I would not recommend the app to anyone because of all of the bugs. A lot of fixes are needed. #trump2020

attributes.title: Iâ€™m disappointed

It hardly loads when I try to sign up for rallies and events. I guess Iâ€™ll have just have to go on the website.

attributes.title: Itâ€™s designed to to overwhelm you
attributes.review: The whole thing is made to completely shove info into your face. I donâ€™t want the same stuff sent to me by text, email, by calls, and this app. I got it so I could have one place for everything about our president. Please fix this

attributes.title: Horrible Application
attributes.review: The app takes hours to download and doesnâ€™t even work! User interface is difficult to work with and customer service is awful. Honestly, no one with such horrible app development skills should be elected president. Choose wisely when voting.

attributes.title: Not a help at all
attributes.review: I was very interested to find a nice news source directly for my phone. Sadly this caused my phone to glitch and it was a burden. The notifications are non stop but then you canâ€™t click on it to go back to the app!! Because of these reasons it gets 1 star for me

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible, not only does it look like it was created by a 7 year old but itâ€™s entirely stupid and serves no purpose. It made my phone crash and made my phone so much slower than it used to be! I have a new phone so this should not be happening

attributes.title: Slowed my phone.
attributes.review: My coworker recommended this app because I donâ€™t like reading the news but wanted to stay up to date. The information on the app appears biased & sometimes just false. Also very much slowed down my phone & the app crashes so much, itâ€™s not worth having.

attributes.title: this is so stupid

attributes.title: Glitchy phone
attributes.review: This app would crash every time I opened it and then would have my phone go all wonky for hours afterwards.
